name: Prototype: Endless Runner with PADS
description:
Godot PADS game

My first Godot project from 2019. It is an endless runner which tries to adapt the difficulty to your performance, based on an initial profile. 

Read more

You can read more on the Profile-Based adaptive difficulty system used in this project here: https://www.mathiasbauer.com/profile-based-adaptive-difficulty

Further stuff

The pixel art was made by myself, get it here (free).

If you’re brave enough to witness badly written years old code, then have a look at the game on a GitLab server (free).
